owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: HARVCORE: a bibliotek-o and BIBFRAME 2.0 Ontology Extension
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The HARVCORE ontology extension defines Harvard Specific additions and modifications to bibliotek-o and BIBFRAME 2, and is intended to be used as a supplement to bibliotek-o and the core BIBFRAME 2 ontology. It is product of the Mellon Foundation-funded Linked Data for Libraries - Labs and Linked Data for Production projects. See http://ld4l.org for more information on these projects.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Harvard Library local identifier
owl:Class.skos:definition: Identifier established locally at Harvard Library and not a standard number.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HOLLIS local identifier
owl:Class.skos:definition: HOLLIS (Harvard OnLine Library Information System) local catalog number that identifies a resource description.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Harvard Geospatial Library local identifier
owl:Class.skos:definition: Identifier established locally for the Harvard Geospatial Library and not a standard number.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Harvard Film Archive local identifier
owl:Class.skos:definition: Identifier established locally at Harvard Film Archive and not a standard number.
